message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for an introductory price of $110. Don't miss out on this exclusive opportunity!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. That's a decent price, but I'm on a bit of a budget. Would you consider $90?

I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. While I understand your budget constraints, I would like to counter your offer with a price of $95. This still offers a good deal compared to the market value.
